Traditional DAF Grant

Contact your DAF sponsoring organization to recommend a grant using:

  • Legal Name: Dagogo Pollyn Foundation
  • Address: No. 1 TOPA CLOSE, ONOSA, IBEJU-LEKKI, LAGOS, NIGERIA

Please include your name and address in the grant report for acknowledgment.

Important DAF Guidelines
  • Cannot accept DAF grants as payments towards existing pledges
  • Donors may not receive more than incidental benefits from DAF grants
  • Consult your tax advisor regarding benefit implications

Alternative Transfer Options

For donors who prefer direct bank transfers from their DAF proceeds

Access Bank
  • Account Name: Dagogo Pollyn Foundation
  • Account Number: 1911981266
  • SWIFT Code: ABNGNGLA
Zenith Bank
  • Account Name: Dagogo Pollyn Foundation
  • Account Number: 1017723670
  • SWIFT Code: ZEIBNGLA
Tax Compliance Information

The Dagogo Pollyn Foundation strictly adheres to all tax regulations regarding donor-advised funds. We cannot:

  • Provide goods or services in exchange for DAF grants
  • Accept DAF funds to fulfill pledge commitments
  • Issue thank-you gifts for DAF contributions

Please consult your DAF sponsor or tax advisor before initiating your grant.
